review: You have to clear the cache EVERY time you watch a 30 minute TV show, or it with start buffering. Annoying.
author: KH "lukesmom"

review: WIFI keeps dropping out on it.  Everything else in the house can connect fine.  Will be returning for a replacement.
author: Bridgit

review: The Fire TV Stick was very easy to install.  It guides you through the installation process.  Within minutes I was logged into my other accounts and was even able to fling YouTube from my IOS device simply by pairing my phone and typing in a passcode provided. I have an Apple TV downstairs and the Fire TV Stick loads and navigates faster and I haven't had any buffering pauses while watching a movie.  I am very happy with it so far.
author: Randy

review: I just love it. Much more than I ever expected. Thanks!!!
author: Greg First

review: I was excited to have a device to easily run Amazon Prime on my TV; however, I have been very disappointed by the Fire Stick.  I purchased the Fire Stick on special for $19 and would be very upset had I paid full price for the device.This is the third streaming device I have connected to my TV, and it is the only one with connectivity issues.  The Fire Stick loses connection every couple of minutes.  I have two wifi networks in my home, and I have the same issue on both networks.  Meanwhile my other streaming device never drop connection.The other issue I have with the Fire Stick is the menu.  The menu is not as convenient and user friendly as its competitors' menus.  It took awhile to find the videos I own versus the videos on Prime and the videos you have to pay to video.There is much room for improvement and would wait for Amazon to develop their streaming devices a bit more before investing in one.
author: Dean

review: If you have Direct Tv its pretty much worthless for any tv apps. I bought it for the Showtime Anytime app and it doesnt work with Direct tv which stinks... works good for prime videos and such.
author: rex

review: I purchased the Fire TV Stick with the hope that with the "Over 200,000 TV episodes and movies", many of the old TV shows from the 60's and 70's would be available to watch.  Not many old TV shows are available, and of the ones that are, very few episodes can be watched.
author: Stephen A Moscardini

review: I've had them all and this is the very best media player. I love all the apps available for it. I was dealing with having to switch back and forth with my Chromecast, Apple TV, etc. due to all of them not having all the apps available. With the Fire TV Stick, I am able to get my Amazon Prime Video, Real Cloud Player, Netflix, Crackle, Hulu...basically all the apps I needed!!!
author: Edgar Tenorio

review: I have spent many hours and don't have it working yet. Going to try it on a different TV today. Had to call my internet provider 3 times, they couldn't help me. It is easy to install, getting it to work right is another story.
author: John Hamilton
